about_the_game:
Play as Belphora, a daughter of war who lost her father in the battle against the Light. The forces of Light have taken over your castle—your home. You are the sole survivor!

Engage in close combat against your own minions, who have fallen out of control. Use magical stones that can be embedded in your sword to gain special advantages.


To reclaim your castle, you must pass through the dark Darkmoon Forest and defeat its powerful guardian. Once you reach the castle, eliminate all enemies who have occupied your home and face the almighty Angel of Light to drive back the forces of Light.

Key Features: Classic side-scroller with action-packed gameplay Explore various regions and discover hidden treasures Battle diverse enemies with unique fighting styles Confront two formidable bosses who stand in the way of your bloodline Collect souls and purchase useful equipment to grow stronger

  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260 or Radeon HD 4850

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750 or AMD Phenom II x4 945

short_description: Revenge against the forces of good! That is the goal of the dark elf Belphora, who wants to avenge the death of her father. Explore the beautiful pixel art world, find items to improve yourself and fight various enemies in this Metroidvania-like game. Fight for glory and revenge!
